statements: DELETE FROM nutrition_info WHERE protein >= 20 AND carbs <= 50;
DELETE FROM Meal_Plans WHERE plan_id = 100 AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
DELETE FROM Meal_Plans WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND meal_time = '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Meal_Plans WHERE plan_name = 'Summer Plan';
DELETE FROM Pilates_Workouts WHERE workout_name = 'Morning Stretch';
DELETE FROM Meal_Plans WHERE plan_name = 'Weight Loss Plan';
DELETE FROM UserMeals WHERE user_id = 1001 AND date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM Meal_Plans WHERE calories_limit < 2000 AND fat_limit > 30;
